attributes.action: All workers right to take Xmas holidays.
attributes.additional_details:
Workers in the uk, lost the right to have Christmas eve, Christmas day and boxing days off .its everyone's right  to have off  and celebrate those 3 days of Christmas.. regardless of the greed of big business.
A law to protect workers rights to have take christmas days off.
attributes.background: To bring in a law to stop people being forced to work Christmas eve, christmas Day, and boxing day.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Require all non-essential businesses to close on Christmas and Boxing Day
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/704790
